name: Universal Bullin
acquisitionMethod: Quest, Munitions Shop, Login Rewards, Points Exchange

1.name: Default
1.description: Universal Bullin. Can be used to limit break all ships with rarity of elite and below.

1.name: Remodel Girl
1.description: Can be used as material to Limit Break any ship of Elite (SR) quality and below.

1.chinese: 泛用型布里，可以用于精锐以下所有舰娘的突破
1.chineseTL: Universal Bullin. Can be used to limit break all ships with rarity of elite and below.
1.japanese: 汎用型ブリ。Sレア以下のキャラの限界突破に使用可能
1.japaneseTL: Universal Bullin. Can be used to Limit Break any characters of SR quality and below.

2.chinese: 他们说人家和姐姐是一样的buli呢，好像负责的颜色不一样……颜色？——好吃！
2.chineseTL: They said I'm a buli like my sister, but it seems we're responsible for different colors... Colors? Sounds tasty!
2.japanese: みんなプリンは姉ちゃんと一緒だと言ってるプリンだけど、担当の色が違うプリン？…そういえば色ってなに？ーーなんか美味そうプリン！
2.japaneseTL: Everyone says me and my purin sister do the same thing, but don't they know we affect different colors purin? Oh yeah, what's a "color"?ーーIt sounds kinda tasty purin!

3.chinese: buli？——人家好像能把你的舰队bulibuli上去哦！
3.chineseTL: buli? Seems like I can help bulibuli up your fleet!
3.japanese: プリン？ーーわたし、艦隊をプリンっと強くすることができるっぽい？
3.japaneseTL: Purin?ーーI think I'm able to purin power up your fleet?

4.chinese: 人家这一扳手下去，办公室的地板可能会buli穿！
4.chineseTL: One swing of my wrench might buli through the office floor!
4.japanese: レンチ一発で、執務室の床もぶち抜くプリン！
4.japaneseTL: Just one purin smack from my wrench would demolish the floor in the office!

5.chineseTL: buli? buli? Where am I? What should I do?
5.japanese: プリン？ーープリン？ここどこ？何すればいいの？
5.japaneseTL: Purin?ーーPurin? Where am I? What am I supposed to do?

6.japanese: わたし、こうプリンってしたら結構強いよ！
6.japaneseTL: If I'd whack them like purin and this then it would hurt for them!

7.chinese: 不用buli了吗？真的不用吗？那人家就去玩啦？哇——
7.chineseTL: You don't need buli anymore? Are you sure? Then can I go play? Whoo!
7.japanese: プリンに任せることないの？本当にないの？じゃあサボるよ？わーーい
7.japaneseTL: Is there really nothing you want purin to do? Nothing? Then I'll idle here. Hooraaaaay!

8.chinese: 指挥官，跟我一起去挖宝藏buli吧！
8.chineseTL: Commander, let's go buli on a treasure hunt!
8.japanese: 指揮官、お宝、一緒にプリンっと掘って行こうよ！
8.japaneseTL: Commander-san, let's set out with a purin and dig for treasure!

9.chineseTL: buli? Need me to buli you a bit?
9.japanese: プリン？指揮官にプリンってしていい？
9.japaneseTL: Purin? Is it okay if I purin you, Commander?

11.japanese: プリン？ーー任務って、なぁに？

12.chineseTL: Rewards... Can I eat them like bulibuli?
12.japanese: ボーナス…プリンっと、食べていい？
12.japaneseTL: A bonus… is it okay for me to eat it like purin?

13.chineseTL: Just as I buli, strange mail popped out...
13.japanese: プリンってしたら、メールが出てきたっぽい…
13.japaneseTL: Looks like mail arrives if I just purin…

14.chineseTL: buli!! Look, don't I look energetic!
14.japanese: プリン！！見て見て、わたしすっごく元気だよ～
14.japaneseTL: Purin!! Look, look! I'm feeling super full of energy~

15.japanese: プリン！誰か帰ってきた！

17.chinese: 虽然不太明白，好像只能上去buli了~
17.chineseTL: Although I don't really understand, I guess I have to go and buli!
17.japanese: よくわからないけどやるしかないプリン～！
17.japaneseTL: I don't know what's going on, but I've gotta purin do it~!

18.chineseTL: buli? Could it be... that I'm super strong?!
18.japanese: プリン？ーーもしかして…わたし超強い！？
18.japaneseTL: Purin?ーーDoes this mean that I'm… actually super strong!?

19.chineseTL: Eh? Seems like I'm a battle buli?
19.japanese: あれ？わたし……戦闘用じゃないプリン？
19.japaneseTL: What? I'm… not meant for combat?

20.chinese: 我的扳手是砸穿大地的扳手口牙！
20.chineseTL: My wrench is the wrench that pierces the earth!
20.chineseNote: A reference to the anime Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
20.japanese: わたしのレンチは大地を貫くレンチなのだぁ！
20.japaneseTL: My wrench is the one that will pierce the earth!

22.chinese: 哇——！指挥官是笨蛋，笨~蛋，笨——蛋！
22.chineseTL: Wahh! Commander's a dummy, dummyy, dummmyyy!
22.japanese: わあーー！指揮官のバカ、バーカ！バーーーカ！
22.japaneseTL: Waaaahh! Commander is a dummy, dummyyyyy! Duuuuummmyyyy!

23.chinese: 姐姐好像只负责一种颜色！但是我负责好多颜色！也就是说我其实比姐姐厉害！？哇！我比姐姐厉害！
23.chineseTL: It seems my big sister is only responsible for one color! But I'm responsible for many colors! Which means I'm actually more powerful than her?! Wow! I'm more powerful than my sister!
23.japanese: 姉ちゃんは金色だから、一つの色しか強くすることができないっぽい！わたしは色んな色を強くすることができるっぽい！？それってわたしが姉ちゃんよりすごいっぽい！？わあ！わたし、姉ちゃんよりすごーい！
23.japaneseTL: Since my sister's golden, I think she can only reinforce a single color! I think I can reinforce all kinds of colors!? I think that makes me amazinger than my sister!? Whoa! I'm amazingerer than my sister!

24.chinese: 虽然能让大家变强很高兴，但是和指挥官一起玩也很高兴buli！作为报答，布里也让指挥官变强吧！……欸，不行吗？！
24.chineseTL: Although I'm glad to help everyone get stronger, I also enjoy playing with Commander buli! As thanks, Bullin will also help strengthen Commander! ...Eh, why not?!
24.japanese: みんなを強くするのは楽しいけど、指揮官と遊ぶのも楽しいプリン！もう指揮官も強くしちゃおうプリン！…ほぇ、ダメー！？
24.japaneseTL: Making all the girls stronger is fun, but playing games with the Commander is fun too purin! I wanna make the Commander strong too purin! …Aww, I can't!?

25.chinese: 我们姐妹本来就不是面向战斗的设计，所以比姐姐要聪明一点的布里妹妹必须向你道歉！因为可爱？呀~~布里感觉自己坠入爱河啦~
25.chineseTL: We sisters were not designed for battle. As the slightly smarter of the Bullins, I need to apologize! Because it's cute? Kya~ Bullin feels like she's fallen in love!
25.japanese: 戦闘向きじゃないのに使ってくれたから、この姉ちゃんよりちょっぴり頭のいいプリンちゃんが感謝しなきゃならないの！なに？可愛い？きゃーープリン恋愛しちゃったプリン~
25.japaneseTL: I'm not meant for battle yet you still use me, and since this little purin here is just a little smarter than her sister, she needs to say she's grateful for it! What? You think I'm cute? Kyaaaahh, purin's fallen in love purin~

26.chinese: 布里妹妹一见到指挥官就觉得心跳得好快，紧张地想要拆了整个码头，难道，难道这就是……小宇宙爆发了！
26.chineseTL: When Bullin sees Commander, her heart races and she feels like dismantling the entire dock. C-could this be... the explosion of Cosmos?
26.japanese: プリンちゃん、指揮官を見るとドキッとして母港ドックを解体したくなっちゃうの！もしかしてこれ……小宇宙（コスモ）がドッカーンってやつ？！
26.japaneseTL: When little purin sees the Commander, her heart skips a beat and she feels like deconstructing the home port's whole dock! Is this that…… thing that'll make the cosmos go kapoooow!?

27.chinese: 布里妹妹被攻略啦~哇，好害羞，怎么办！呀~要去买决胜内衣了，要被做各种各样奇怪的事啦！
27.chineseTL: Bullin's been conquered! Wah, so embarrassing. What should she do! Kya~ I'll have to buy victory underwear and have all sorts of weird things done to me!
27.japanese: プリンちゃん攻略されちゃった~わああ恥ずかしいよぉ！どうしよう！きゃ~勝負下着買わされて変なことされちゃうよ！
27.japaneseTL: Little purin got captured~! Waaahh this is so embarrassing! What will she do! Kyah~ I'm gonna be forced to buy lucky panties and have weird things done to me!

28.chinese: 情人节今天是，所以要给指挥官送巧克力bulin? 但是布里不知道巧克力怎么做bulin? 布里大危机bulin!? 路过的航母给了布里巧克力bulin!送给指挥官bulin! 搞定bulin!
28.chineseTL: Today is Valentine's Day, so I have to give the Commander chocolate bulin? But Bullin doesn't know how to make chocolate bulin? Bullin is in a big crisis bulin!? A passing by aircraft carrier gave Bullin chocolate bulin. I'll give it to the Commander bulin! Problem solved bulin!
28.japanese: 今日はバレンタインだから、指揮官にチョコをプレゼントするプリン？でもブリはチョコの作り方を知らないプリン！？ブリがピンチプリン！？通りすがりの空母がチョコをくれたプリン！指揮官にプレゼントプリン！セーフプリン！
28.japaneseTL: It's Valentine's, so I'm meant to give a purin present to the Commander? But Bullin doesn't know how to make chocolate purin!? Bullin is in big trouble purin!? A passing aircraft carrier gave me some chocolate purin! I'll give it to the Commander purin! Crisis averted purin!

29.chinese: 情人节的惯例～是收下人家的巧克力purin！人家送的巧克力有时候会变多purin!?不过变多后也只有一个purin！怎么回事purin!?
29.japanese: バレンタインは～ブリからのチョコを貰うのが定番だプリン！ブリからもらうチョコは時々増えるプリン！？でも増えても一つだプリン！どうしてプリン！？
